    Provide the SlotMapping that translates between the contained Operators and the containing CompositeOperator as defined by OperatorContainer.toOperator().

    static SlotMapping
    SlotMapping.wrap(Operator wrappee, Operator wrapper)
    Creates a new instance where the Slots of the wrapper are mapped to the Slots of the wrappee, thereby matching their Slots by their index (as in Operator.getInput(int) and Operator.getOutput(int)).
